Tidal Waves and Tsunamis
Earthquakes
Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
lead_paragraph: Kei Igawa has been unable to locate his family, which lives in the section of Japan that was ravaged by a post-quake tsunami.
snippet: Kei Igawa has been unable to locate his family, which lives in the section of Japan that was ravaged by a post-quake tsunami.
